title: CloudFix: Automated Policy Repair for Cloud Access Control Policies Using Large Language Models
summary: Access control policies are vital for securing modern cloud computing, where organizations must manage access to sensitive data across thousands of users in distributed system settings. Cloud administrators typically write and update policies manually, which can be an error-prone and time-consuming process and can potentially lead to security vulnerabilities.
